official-title.#text:
To provide for the conveyance of unused Federal property
		  administered by the Department of the Navy at the site of the former Oxnard Air
		  Force Base, Ventura County, California.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

			 Oxnard Air Force Base, Ventura County, California

vacates the parcel of real property known as DOD
			 Camarillo Airport, which was originally deeded to the

at

may convey, without
